source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_001<tab>Come here from across the ice fields, did you? Then we'd better hope you weren't followed by any of them crazed soldiers, or we're done for.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_001<tab>あんた、氷原から来たのか？
ここへ来るとき、おかしくなった帝国兵どもに、
尾けられちゃいないだろうな……。

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_002<tab>We heard some bloody awful noise comin' from the capital, but it's finally stopped. That weren't nothin' to do with you and yours, was it?
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_002<tab>帝都の方から微かに聞こえてた気味の悪い音が、
ちょっと前、急に止まったんだ。
あんたら、何かしたのか……？

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_003<tab>I dunno what's goin' on out there, but it ain't good. I'm stayin' put until this all blows over.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_003<tab>なぁおい、なんだよあの空の色……。
気味が悪いったらないぜ、しばらく外には出たくねえな。

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_004<tab>Looks like the bizarre goin's-on have come to an end, includin' the attacks by them soldiers who'd all gone mad. I reckon it's high time we looked around the capital to see what we can salvage.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_004<tab>おい、空模様が元に戻ったぜ！
見境なく襲ってくる兵士もいないって聞いたし、
久々に、帝都の様子を見に行けるかもな……。
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_100<tab>Like the others here, I took to livin' in the caves to get away from the chaos in the city. These days, I scrape by on what I can find or by tradin' ceruleum with the other survivors.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_100<tab>……俺はアーラート。
この洞窟に逃げ込んだ避難民のひとりさ。
青燐水と物資を取引して、どうにか暮らしている。

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_101<tab>Thing is, most of us shouldn't even be here in the first place. We was dragged to Garlemald against our will from the provinces and forced to do hard labor. Then, when everyone else lost their minds, we took our chance and scarpered.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_101<tab>ここにいる連中には、属州出身者が多くてな。
かくいう俺も、帝都で下級労働者として働いてたんだが、
周りの連中の様子がおかしくなって、街から退避したのさ……。

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_102<tab>Much as I hate to admit it, the skills we learned from extractin' and processin' ceruleum for the Garleans are what's kept us alive out here. One thing's for certain, though─we can't carry on like this forever.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_102<tab>まぁ、強制労働の中で学んだ、青燐水精製の知識のおかげで、
こうして生き延びてるってのは皮肉だな。
今後については……まだ、何も考えられてねえよ。

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_200<tab>You've seen what's happened to the capital, haven't you? We came here to get away from all that, and this is the safest place we could find.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_200<tab>帝都を脱出した奴らが風避けのために集まってる、
ただの小さな洞穴だよ。

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_201<tab>We've come to callin' it Tapper's Den because we survive by extractin'─or “tappin'” as we call it─the ceruleum from the lake. We either burn it to stay warm or trade it for goods with other refugees.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_201<tab>近頃じゃ、タッパーズデン……
「すすり屋の隠れ家」なんて呼ぶやつも出てきてるぜ。
青燐水を盗掘して生き延びてる俺らに、ぴったりな名じゃねえか。

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_202<tab>I can tell you ain't part of the Empire, so you're among friends here. If you've got anythin' worth havin', we'll gladly trade it for ceruleum.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_202<tab>なんにせよ、俺には帝国への忠義なんてねえからよ。
あんたらが相応の食料や物資を用意してくれるってんなら、
精製した青燐水は分けてやるぜ。

source: TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_203<tab>The chaos might've died down, but it's not as if we have much to return to in the city. For now, we'll probably just carry on as we are. Oh, and tell your friends if they need ceruleum to come and see us, providin' they've got somethin' of their own to share.
target:
TEXT_REGISB5TAPPERSDEN_00752_AALART_000_203<tab>まだしばらくは、盗掘で稼げそうだからな。
あんたら派遣団が、食料や物資を用意してくれる限り、
青燐水の取引は続けさせてもらうぜ。
